Title: Provides for the phase-out of state use of pesticides on state property and for state agency pest management plans
Summary: Provides for the phase-out on varying time schedules of state use of various categories of pesticides on state property; provides that it does not apply to certain antimicrobial pesticides; requires the department of environmental conservation to adopt a pest management plan for every state department, agency, and public benefit corporation; provides for waivers and exemptions.
LawCode: Add Art 33 Title 8 §§33-0801 & 33-0803, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the phase-out of state use of pesticides
